data.name: SessionQuitChecker_QuitCloudActivated_Message
data.value: The session is activated. If you quit the session, it will be in error and other participants will not be able to synchronize data. Do you want to quit the session?

data.name: SessionQuitChecker_QuitNonActivated_Message
data.value: Do you want to quit the session?

data.name: AddTrustedClient_Introduction_OnSessionMemberSide
data.value: A client that does not belong to your Trusted Clients applies to join the Synchronization Session. You must add it to your Trusted Clients before it can join the Synchronization Session. Please make sure the Security Words are the same and in the same order on your client and the requesting client before saving this Trusted Client.

data.name: AddTrustedClient_Introduction_OnJoiningMemberSide
data.value: You are applying to join a Synchronization Session that has members who do not belong to your Trusted Clients. You must add these Session Members to your Trusted Clients in order to join this session. Please ensure that the Security Words are the same and in the same order on your client and on each Session Member client before saving these Trusted Clients.
